Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary variable: 1 if worker w is assigned to team t, 0 otherwise

Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary variable: 1 if user story us is assigned to sprint sp, 0 otherwise

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary variable: 1 if team t is assigned to project p, 0 otherwise

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary variable: 1 if feature f is selected for release rep, 0 otherwise

Name: sprint_story_points_total
Description: Total number of story points planned for a sprint

Name: sprint_start_date
Description: The start date of a given sprint (e.g.

Name: task_effort_hours
Description: The estimated effort in hours for a specific task

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: The priority level assigned to a feature

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary variable: 1 if task tsk is assigned to worker w, 0 otherwise

Name: select_worker_for_team
Description: Decides if a worker should be added to a team roster

Name: set_sprint_end_date
Description: The end date of a given sprint (e.g.

Name: assign_task_to_story
Description: Binary variable: 1 if task tsk belongs to user story us, 0 otherwise
